info.name: FPT Corporation
info.description: FPT Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology (IT) and telecommunication products and services in Vietnam and internationally. It operates through Information Technology and Telecommunication; and Investment, Education and Others segments. The company offers internet services to individuals and households, as well as to enterprises, including internet leased line, domestic and international telecommunication, domain, hosting, web portal, and IPTV services, etc.; and online services for enterprises and individual customers, such as online newspapers and advertising, online music, and online payment services, etc. It also provides various IT services, including software production, digital transformation, IT system transformation, quality assurance testing, embedded software design, and ERP implementation and management services, as well as consultancy and deployment of S.M.A.C./Internet of Things; application software solutions, information system integration services, data center, and networking and security system design/development; warranty and maintenance of IT products; and IT equipment. In addition, the company offers FPT AI Factory, a flagship solution that serves as a one-stop shop for AI and Cloud services for AI advancement and development; software outsourcing, software package and solutions, and software services; digital transformation and IT consulting, system management, BPO, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence and automation services; pay television and value added services; and training services in IT and business management at general education, high education, university, and post-graduate levels; and manages financial investments. The company has a strategic collaboration with ATEC Co., Ltd. to develop automotive software solutions. The company was formerly known as The Corporation for Financing and Promoting Technology and changed its name to FPT Corporation in December 2008. FPT Corporation was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam.
